alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:02AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Garfield County through 100 AM MDT... At 1201 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edwards, or 19 miles southwest of Jordan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordan, Sand Springs, Cohagen, Edwards and Steve Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
